data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Thiruvallur prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thiruvallur, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Thiruvallur, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 41,009 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Thiruvallur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Thiruvallur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Thiruvallur, Tamil Nadu, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Thiruvallur, Tamil Nadu, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
